mapper.insert: insert into rasberryPiData (rasberryPiID, frequency, collectTime, cpuAverageUsage, cpuPerUsage, cpuLogicCores, cpuTemperature, memoryTotal, memoryUsed, memoryFree, memoryPercent, swapTotal, swapUsed, swapFree, swapPercent, latency, createTime ) values (#{rasberryPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{frequency,jdbcType=REAL}, #{collectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cpuAverageUsage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cpuPerUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpuLogicCores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cpuTemperature,jdbcType=REAL}, #{memoryTotal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memoryUsed,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memoryFree,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memoryPercent,jdbcType=REAL}, #{swapTotal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{swapUsed,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{swapFree,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{swapPercent,jdbcType=REAL}, #{latency,jdbcType=REAL}, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: update rasberryPiData set rasberryPiID = #{rasberryPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=REAL}, collectTime = #{collectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cpuAverageUsage = #{cpuAverageUsage,jdbcType=REAL}, cpuPerUsage = #{cpuPerUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpuLogicCores = #{cpuLogicCores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cpuTemperature = #{cpuTemperature,jdbcType=REAL}, memoryTotal = #{memoryTotal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, memoryUsed = #{memoryUsed,jdbcType=BIGINT}, memoryFree = #{memoryFree,jdbcType=BIGINT}, memoryPercent = #{memoryPercent,jdbcType=REAL}, swapTotal = #{swapTotal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, swapUsed = #{swapUsed,jdbcType=BIGINT}, swapFree = #{swapFree,jdbcType=BIGINT}, swapPercent = #{swapPercent,jdbcType=REAL}, latency = #{latency,jdbcType=REAL}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, rasberryPiID, frequency, collectTime, cpuAverageUsage, cpuPerUsage, cpuLogicCores, cpuTemperature, memoryTotal, memoryUsed, memoryFree, memoryPercent, swapTotal, swapUsed, swapFree, swapPercent, latency, createTime from rasberryPiData where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, rasberryPiID, frequency, collectTime, cpuAverageUsage, cpuPerUsage, cpuLogicCores, cpuTemperature, memoryTotal, memoryUsed, memoryFree, memoryPercent, swapTotal, swapUsed, swapFree, swapPercent, latency, createTime from rasberryPiData
select * from rasberryPiData where collectTime between #{startTimestamp, jdbcType=BIGINT} and #{endTimestamp, jdbcType=BIGINT} and rasberryPiID = #{rasberryPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
